name: bolt-strike
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
